problems.title: Count Words in a String
problems.description:
Count the number of words in a given string. Words are separated by spaces.

Input Format:
First line contains a string.

Output Format:
Print the count of words.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
Hello World Java

Sample Output
3

Explanation:
The string has 3 words: "Hello", "World", "Java"
hintsList: Split the string by spaces and count the parts. Or iterate through string and count spaces, then add 1.
